reviewText: I really like the way Alain and the Producer present the subject brands.  I expected the Lotus Brand's products, to be as interesting as those on my other "Victory" DVD's. They didn't quite raise to those levels.

Lotus founder Colin Chapman is the father of modern F1 technology he was simply brilliant. To this day you still see his shadow cast over F1 engineering. I own an Esprit though 20 year old it's styling and performance still turns head and draws a crowd. The Esprit is a very stunning machine;it's speed and most of all handling suggests it's F1 inspiration and pedigree. Make no mistake about it Colin not Enzo set the engineering standard of F1.
